name: speakr
description: Speakr is a self-hosted text-to-speech service with a web UI for entering text and generating audio files. It can integrate into other apps via a simple HTTP API.

features.title: Text
features.description: Converts text into natural-sounding speech audio

features.title: Multiple Voices
features.description: Offers various voice options with different accents and styles

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Downloads generated speech as MP3 or WAV files

features.title: Ssml Support
features.description: Uses Speech Synthesis Markup Language for advanced control

features.title: Pronunciation Control
features.description: Adjusts pronunciation of specific words or phrases

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Controls speech rate from slow to fast

features.title: Pitch Control
features.description: Modifies voice pitch for different effects
